statement.p: Here is a figure made of a circle inscribed in a square.
If the radius of the circle is 6.00 ft:
(a) What is the area of the square? Preview Question 1 Part 1 of 3 \displaystyle{f}{t}^{{2}}
(b) What is the area of the circle? Round to the nearest tenth. Preview Question 1 Part 2 of 3 \displaystyle{f}{t}^{{2}}
(c) What is the area of the shaded section? Preview Question 1 Part 3 of 3 \displaystyle{f}{t}^{{2}}
